area_name: You must be this tall boulder

content.description: Start sitting almost at the bottom of the hill just to left of the most overhanging part of the Boulder with hands on side pull and feet on good holds. Climb up to a smooth shelf and move slightly right to reach for a tiny shark tooth then to a incut crimp to gain the lip  for a kinda high mantel.
content.location: Starts sitting 6-7ft left of crack on the right side  of the Boulder.   Almost at the bottom of the little hill  on the right side of the slabby main face.

content.description: Start at eye level shelf jug, in between You Must Be This Tall and Tumble Bug. Go up to either shark tooth crimp from You Must Be This Tall with the left or a right hand crimp shared with Tumble bug. Climb straight up in between these two climbs, uses hols from both, but seemed to be a fine line by itself if you are looking for some easy mileage.
content.location: Right side of the You Must Be This Tall boulder in between  You Must Be This Tall and Tumble Bug. Shares holds with both climbs.

content.description: Start on huge jug shelf, trend up through more amazing jugs and sidepull flakes. Top out straight up. Easy warm-up climb.
content.location: Left arete of the face of the You Must Be This Tall boulder that is up on the hill. You Must Be This Tall and Tumble Bug are to the right of this climb.

content.description: Starts sitting at the big side pull, climb up and dyno to the lip.
content.location: Right side of Boulder a few feet left of obvious crack.

content.description: Sit start on the right arete of the front face of the boulder on left facing side pull crimps directly next to the faded :) graffiti. Start hands crossed and feet low and left; move out with the right hand to a small flake low on the right arete and from there bump it up to a jug (about 1' left of the start hold of Turkey Vulture).  Once you have that good right hand, hand heel match with the left and bump up the left side of the arete to a set of good crimps, adjust the feet and then go up with the right hand to a finger bucket from which you can easily gain the top shelf and finish in the right tube of Glass Tube.
content.location: This climb starts in between Glass Tube and Turkey Vulture and trends straight up the arete.

content.description: Start standing on right facing side pull flakes, trend up and right to a good shelf at about 8/9'. Use juggy hols and flakes to establish yourself on the shelf and then move up to the top of the boulder through either of the tube shaped depressions in the rock. Both sides are very easy and very low angle. Okay warm-up, the holds are cool.
content.protection: 1-2 pads. Climb is very easy but the landing is covered with glass at the moment.
content.location: If walking up the hill to the front face of this boulder, with You Must Be This Tall and Tumble Bug around on the right face, Glass Tube will be on the left of the front face. Starting on huge right facing sidepull flakes.

content.description: Start on good incut right facing edges, ~ 2-3' to the right of the start of Tumble Bug. Pull on and up to more right facing edges and crimps trending up towards the crack above you and right of Tumble Bug. Use the crack for a left hand and move up and right to a good crimp seam below the lip. Top out over the stacked rocks or step around them for a barely easier finish.
content.location: Right most boulder on the You Must Be This Tall boulder. Just to the left of the tree on the hill near the top of the boulder.

pathTokens: You must be this tall boulder

content.description: Great warm up boulder. It has a ton of easy climbs and few OK ones. It's a nice place to work on techniques ,or just to pull around on some easy problems after work.
